casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

94-2284. Nos. 93APE12-1670 and 93APE12-1671. Redman v. Ohio Dept. of Indus. Relations, Ohio Div. of Mines. Franklin County,

The discretionary appeal is allowed on Propositions of Law II and IV only.

Douglas, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., would also allow the other propositions of law. Wright and Resnick, JJ., dissent and would not allow the discretionary appeal.
